name: Blenx - Puzzle
description:
Blenx is an elegant shape-matching puzzler. Train your brain to Improve your thinking speed and memory. it's fun and challenging!

GAME RULE:

Remember BLACK + BLACK = WHITE (is simple!)

Drag and stack the shapes on the board to match the final shape.

GAME MODE:

[Challenge Mode] 120 Levels, from easy to hard.

[Random Mode] Play randomly select shape.

[Custom mode] Edit and create your own shape. support up to 5 shapes per game!

GAME FEATURES:

[Edit] Create your own shape and share with your friends!

[Share] Generate share codes and play against friends! No internet connection required

[PVP] Extra game options: 'Hide Shape' (challenge memory) 'No Withdraw' (shapes can only be moved once)
